.b-resourceutilization .b-timeline-subgr.title: Resource utilization view
.b-resourceutilization .b-timeline-subgr.content: A partner Timeline widget which shows resource allocations for the project.

.group-buttons .b-button.title: View grouping
.group-buttons .b-button.content: Click these buttons to toggle the view grouping.

.b-resourceutilization .b-grid-row[data-.title: Resource with 300% maximum allocation
.b-resourceutilization .b-grid-row[data-.content: This resource represents a team of 3 persons and has `maxUnits = 300%` maximum capacity. This is reflected in its allocation status.
